messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: ATLANTA POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Missing Persons Unit
SIGNAL: 76M
ITEM NUMBER: M-76094-31
PAGE 38 of 78
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Sarah Jenkins
Sgt. Brian Cooper
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Michael Smith
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Anna Lopez
Sgt. David Wilson
( Child Search Unit)
Det. Rebecca Hill
Det. Christopher Martin
( Child Search Unit)
Det. Emily Turner
( Child Search Unit)
Det. Steven Hall
Det. Patricia Johnson
(General Assignment)
Det. Joseph Brown
(Missing Youth Division)
Det. Laura Davis
(Investigative Support Unit)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, age 12, student.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
15 SEPTEMBER 2031 at around 4:00 PM in the Grant Park area.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Michael Smith
5287
Throughout the investigation, the team faced a labyrinth of conflicting testimonies and sparse clues. Officer Martinez, assigned to the Grant Park area, was the first to discover signs of the missing child. He was quickly joined by Sgt. Anna Lopez and Patrol Officer Hernandez, who coordinated a thorough search of the area. Technician Walker, specializing in age-progression technology, was brought in to update the missing child's profile. Criminalist Edwards, analyzing the scant evidence, identified belongings of the missing child that were key in narrowing down the search area. Coroner Dr. Thompson was later consulted to assess a separate incident nearby, which fortuitously provided unexpected leads to the missing child case. Patrol Officer Clark, engaging with school communities, gathered vital information that significantly aided the investigation.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Sarah Jenkins Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Missing Persons Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Brian Cooper Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Jenkins. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Michael Smith Officer Context: Lead investigator for the missing child case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Anna Lopez Officer Context: Assisted in coordinating the search, part of the Child Search Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. David Wilson Officer Context: Child Search Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Rebecca Hill Officer Context: Child Search Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Christopher Martin Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Child Search Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emily Turner Officer Context: Child Search Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Steven Hall Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Patricia Johnson Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the missing child case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Joseph Brown Officer Context: Missing Youth Division detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Laura Davis Officer Context: Investigative Support Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Martinez Officer Context: First to discover signs of the missing child in Grant Park. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Hernandez Officer Context: Assisted in coordinating a thorough search of the area. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Walker Officer Context: Specialized in age-progression technology, updated the missing child's profile. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Edwards Officer Context: Analyzed evidence, identified belongings of the missing child. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Thompson Officer Context: Assessed a separate incident, provided leads to the missing child case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Clark Officer Context: Gathered vital information from school communities, aiding the investigation. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
